message.content:
cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.SI, cs.CR, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with a communication problem involving detection, compression, and reconstruction of data, which are all relevant topics in information theory (cs.IT). The use of memoryless processes and binary symmetric sources suggests a focus on multimedia applications (cs.MM) and signal processing (cs.SI). The problem of authentication and error detection also falls under the category of cryptography (cs.CR). Finally, the use of non-asymptotic binning and the investigation of achievable rate-error-distortion regions are topics that are commonly studied in machine learning and statistics (cs.LG).
